author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Joe McCullough has his first Sports Combat game on it's way from Osprey! The noble Hairfoots aren't usually known for their 'sportiness'... but their wilder young folk are trying to change that. Jumping aboard their barnyard critters these brave souls have made a game of tilting... and so should you.

This game comes packed with a whole BONUS game as well; let's check it out!

Thanks to Osprey for the complimentary copy of the book to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.gg/CCmeRy3

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-games/

title: GMG Reviews - Hairfoot Jousting by Osprey Games

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Do you love Redwall? Ever wonder if the small critters in your backyard are secretly part of a monarchic civilization whose king has gone missing? Let's check out the new edition of Burrows & Badgers! 

Thanks to Osprey for the complimentary copy of the book to review.

title: GMG Reviews - Burrows & Badgers (2nd Edition) by Osprey Games

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
One Page Rules continues it's foray into making on-ramps to their world of rules-right Tabletop Wargaming. This prototype 2-Player Starter Set contains just under 80 models, 13 of which are in the new prototype PVC they plan to use for their boxed set. Let's dive in and take a first look at what the plan is for this bridge product between Retail and 3D Printing!

Details on their website HERE: https://www.onepagerules.com/news/grimdark-future-broken-truth-launching-soon-on-gamefound
